result.purpose: Responsible for managing worker goroutines and job execution in a concurrent environment.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating worker-related functionalities and configurations.

pkg/worker/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for the worker package.

pkg/worker/dispatcher.go.purpose: Implements a dispatcher for managing worker goroutines and job queues.

pkg/worker/job.go.purpose: Defines a Job struct that holds a function to execute.

pkg/worker/worker.go.purpose: Defines a Worker struct that manages job execution in a worker pool.
